Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>More like "chasms." You know, the creepy
openings in the ground. Ever since the
Upheaval, they're all over.
In this area, they're <clr:0000>beneath Hyrule Castle<clr:ffff>
and <clr:0000>to the south of Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>.

I heard that members from the research
team went rooting around in some and
ended up in a bad way...
It's best to steer clear.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Ease><sp:0:2:2:5000>I'm glad I'm researching shrines and not
the chasms...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice>Huh? <sp:5:0:0>You mean, like the one right here?<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0701>When the shrines appeared, it caused
such a commotion that they landed in
the newspaper.
"<clr:0000>Mysterious Shrines <clr:ffff>Appear All Over the
World Overnight" was smack on the front
page, you know?
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>So far we know they're from the age
of legends...

But did they fall from the sky or emerge
from the ground?

And just what ARE they, anyway?


<sp:3:0:2:0700>Aside from the <clr:0000>shrines<clr:ffff>, we've also got the
<clr:0000>chasms<clr:ffff>, of course.<sp:5:0:0>

To tell you the truth, we don't know squat
about all of the things that sprung up due
to the Upheaval.<sp:5:0:0>
But the shrines and chasms? They could
be dangerous. Which would be scary. So
we need to investigate them, pronto.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>WAH! <sp:5:0:0>You scared me!<sp:5:0:0> What are you doing
in a place like this?
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>The people from the search party are
putting in long hours at Hyrule Castle,
so I intend to do the same.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>WHOA. <sp:5:0:0>Was that opening there before?<sp:5:0:0>
How could I have missed it...
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Huh? <sp:5:0:0>Um, what is it?<sp:5:0:0> We're close to the
<clr:0000>chasm <clr:ffff>here, so it's dangerous, you know?

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>For all I know, this <clr:0000>shrine <clr:ffff>could be
dangerous too.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>My point is, lots of things are
dangerous ever since the Upheaval.<sp:5:0:0>
So be careful, OK?
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>WAH! <sp:5:0:0>You scared me!<sp:5:0:0> What are you doing
out here in the rain?
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0400>The Hyrule Castle<clr:0000> chasm <clr:ffff>is nearby.
It's dangerous, you know?

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>For all I know, this <clr:0000>shrine<clr:ffff> could be
dangerous too.<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'd say MOST things are dangerous
these days, what with the Upheaval.<sp:5:0:0>
Watch your back.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Did you need something from me?


The Hyrule Castle<clr:0000> chasm <clr:ffff>is nearby, so
my mind is on that at the moment. It's
dangerous, you know?
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>For all I know, this <clr:0000>shrine<clr:ffff> could be
dangerous too.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'd say MOST things are dangerous
these days, what with the Upheaval.<sp:5:0:0>
Watch your back.
Talk_14:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Ugh... I was at the castle town and saw <clr:0000>something
strange moving around<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0>The people from the search party left, so I know
there's no one there now. I've got to wrap things
up and head back to Lookout Landing.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>WAH! <sp:5:0:0>You scared me!<sp:5:0:0> What are you doing
at such an hour?
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>It's dangerous around here because it's
near the Hyrule Castle <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff>.

And...


<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_00><clr:0000>Something's moving around<clr:ffff> in the <clr:0000>castle
town<clr:ffff>... I haven't really looked yet though.
Too scary.
It's probably best not to wander aimlessly
around here.

I'm planning on finishing my shrine
investigations quickly so I can head
back to Lookout Landing.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><sp:0:2:2:5000>If it came down to it, the monster-control crew at the
castle gates would help me...right?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
